tool_description: Upload unlimited files on anonymous server with 100% of security.
title: anonfiles

api_list.name: geFiletInfo
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anonfiles.p.rapidapi.com/v2/file/{file_id}/info"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anonfiles.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

headers.access-control-expose-headers: x-ratelimit-limit, x-ratelimit-remaining, x-ratelimit-reset, access-control-allow-origin, accept-ranges, age, allow, cache-control, connection, content-encoding, content-language, content-length, content-location, content-md5, content-disposition, content-range, content-type, date, etag, expires, last-modified, link, location, p3p, pragma, proxy-authenticate, refresh, retry-after, server, set-cookie, status, strict-transport-security, trailer, transfer-encoding, upgrade, vary, via, warning, www-authenticate, x-frame-options, public-key-pins, x-xss-protection, content-security-policy, x-content-security-policy, x-webkit-csp, x-content-type-options, x-powered-by, x-ua-compatible, x-rapidapi-region, access-control-allow-credentials, access-control-allow-headers, x-rapidapi-version, access-control-allow-methods, access-control-expose-headers

api_list.name: uploadFile
uploadFile
